comment.text: The "ProviderSuccessfullyDisconnected" translation key is used to display a success message when a user disconnects from an OAuth provider. This message is shown as a toast notification in the UI, confirming that the disconnection was successful and providing feedback to the user.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Provayderin əlaqəsi müvəffəqiyyətlə kəsildi' is a literal translation and a bit clunky. A more natural and accurate translation of 'Provider successfully disconnected' would be something like 'Təminatçının bağlantısı kəsildi' or 'Təminatçının əlaqəsi kəsildi'.
The word 'Provayderin' is a misspelling of 'Təminatçının'.

The translation 'Poskytovatel úspěšně odpojen' is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'Provider successfully disconnected' in a natural Czech way. It sounds somewhat awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Poskytovatel byl úspěšně odpojen' or 'Poskytovatele bylo úspěšně odpojeno'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Yhteys palveluntarjoajaan katkaistu' is a bit literal and could be more natural. While technically correct, 'Provider successfully disconnected' implies a clean disconnection event. The Finnish translation reads more like a connection was established and then severed.
The translation 'Le fournisseur est déconnecté avec succès' is a literal translation that sounds unnatural in French. A more natural and idiomatic phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Le fournisseur s'est déconnecté avec succès

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '공급자 연결 해제에 성공했습니다' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Korean. It translates to 'Successfully disconnected the provider'. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the successful disconnection from the provider's perspective.

While technically correct, "ຕັດການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການສຳເລັດແລ້ວ" (tat gaan seum to phu hai borisarn samlet laeo) is a bit literal. A more natural and concise translation would be something along the lines of "ຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການຖືກຖອນຕົວອອກສຳເລັດແລ້ວ" (phu hai borisarn thon tua ok samlet laeo) or "ຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການຖອນຕົວອອກແລ້ວ" (phu hai borisarn thon tua ok laeo).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການຖືກຖອນຕົວອອກສຳເລັດແລ້ວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Provider successfully disconnected' implies a disconnection initiated by the provider. 'Operadora desligada com êxito' translates more literally to 'Operator switched off successfully,' which is a slightly different nuance. While not strictly wrong, it might not perfectly convey the original meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Fornecedor desconectado com sucesso' to more accurately reflect 'Provider disconnected successfully'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Provedor desconectado com sucesso' is a literal translation but slightly awkward in natural Portuguese. A more natural phrasing would be 'Provedor desconectado com êxito' or 'O provedor foi desconectado com sucesso'.

The Romanian translation 'Furnizorul a fost deconectat cu succes' literally translates to 'The provider was disconnected successfully.' While understandable, it's a passive construction. A more natural and active phrasing would better reflect the English 'Provider successfully disconnected'.

The translation "Ponudnik je bil uspešno odklopljen" doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'Provider successfully disconnected'. 'Odklopljen' implies being unplugged or disconnected from a physical connection. A more accurate translation would convey the idea of a provider (likely a service) being successfully terminated or deactivated.

The translation "Провајдер успешно прекинут" doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Provider successfully disconnected'. 'Прекинут' implies a disruption or forceful disconnection. 'Disconnected' implies a more graceful or intended disconnection. A better translation might be 'Провајдер успешно одјављен' or 'Провајдер успешно раскинуо везу'.

The translation "Provajder uspešno prekinut" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Provider successfully disconnected." "Prekinut" implies a more abrupt or forceful disconnection. A better translation would convey the 'successful' aspect more elegantly.
While technically correct, "Đã ngắt kết nối nhà cung cấp thành công" is a bit clunky and formal for a success message. A more natural and concise translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nhà cung cấp đã ngắt kết nối thành công
